reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major pancreatic disease categories: pancreatic cancer (~8), acute pancreatitis (~25), chronic pancreatitis (~12), neuroendocrine tumors (~0.5), cystic fibrosis (~0.1), and other benign pancreatic disorders (~10) = ~55 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneous conditions with different etiologies and geographic variation.
